name: Willow in the Warren
description:
It's summer break. Willow and her friends are bored when the power goes off, so they play some good old fashioned sardines. Then one of the friends drops down a hole, and suddenly things erupt into chaos. Join Willow and her friends as they explore the labyrinth they find and figure out what secrets it holds about what went on there and what went on in their town!  

This is a Demo! The story takes place over five days and this is the first two days. If you find any glitches or errors please let me know.  Any feedback is highly appreciated! I worked really hard on this, so I really hope you enjoy it!

Donations are really appreciated! If you have some extra money and enjoyed the demo I'd be extremely happy if you donated! You can make a donation before downloading the game, or go to my ko.fi https://ko-fi.com/nahubun ! Thank you!
